original_text: God helped Stephen in many special ways. God's power was with him. He did many miracles among the people which showed that God was with him.
korean_text: 스데반이 은혜와 권능이 충만하여 큰 기사와 표적을 민간에 행하니

sentences.original_text: God helped Stephen in many special ways
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 스티븐을 여러 특별한 방법으로 도우셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He did many miracles among the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성들 가운데 많은 기적을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: which showed that God was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 그와 함께 계심을 보여주었습니다
